body_html: Hi~ @vincentvanhoucke Can you tell me with which version of python and ipython the original notebooks were created? I made the changes with the docker container. But even with that, Jupyter still automatically upgrades the notebook version from 3 to 4, which reformats the raw text and leads to a huge messy diff. This is known issue of Jupyter. It offers the ability to convert version 4 to version 3 but it is known that 3->4->3 is not identity.

body: Hi~ @vincentvanhoucke Can you tell me with which version of python and ipython the original notebooks were created? I made the changes with the docker container. But even with that, Jupyter still automatically upgrades the notebook version from 3 to 4, which reformats the raw text and leads to a huge messy diff. This is known issue of Jupyter. It offers the ability to convert version 4 to version 3 but it is known that 3->4->3 is not identity.
